structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Local legislative bodies may acquire interest in real property.
law.text: To carry out the purposes of KRS 65.410 to 65.460, local legislative bodies may acquire by purchase, gift, lease, bequest or otherwise title to or any interests or rights in real property that will provide a means for the preservation or provision of permanent open space land.
